ValidationRule.description: Changing Status from Closed to Reopened
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISBLANK ( Source_System_ID__c ) && OR ( AND( ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE( Status ) , "Closed"), ISPICKVAL( Status , "Open") ), AND ( ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE( Status ) , "Reopened"), ISPICKVAL( Status , "Open") ), AND ( ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE( Status ) , "Open"), ISPICKVAL( Status , "Reopened") ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: We can only change the status from Open to Close, Closed to Reopen and Reopen to Closed
